_xResult.title: Aira A-line Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Long linen A-line skirt with two side pockets
_xResult.longdesc:
Snag this custom made maxi skirt made of pure linen. This linen is heavier weight and is already washed and softened, meaning that it will not shrink and will flow beautifully when you wear it. The high-waisted nature and A-line sillhouette are super flattering, while the zipper in the back and pockets make it both practical and easy to wear.


Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees you that it meets human - ecological requirements. The fabric is already washed and softened linen and will shrink no more.
